Text:
Hi...
Liked what i heard...it sounds like the English hard rock bands did in the 70`s.little maiden + prayin mantis+saxon...and judas p...

Thank you for it...its always nice to hear.

Hi !
Focus first in 3 or 4 songs like Warriors, Lady In Black, No Pride or the Instrumental Sailing Way To India.
And pay attention this was a release from a little independent label.
Original LPs are sold for very high prices in the internet nowadays.
If people like I will post the second LP (Heroes of The Wasteland).
